column6: "ODYSSEY" PART 5 (OF 6) The Earth is destroyed! Humanity is gone! There is only one question: How will we be remembered? You may not like the answer. Guest-starring the Magus, Moondragon and Doctor Doom!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chriscross | writer:Peter David | penciller:Pat Quinn | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
